SearchParam

public SearchParam(int strategy,
                   int lengthening,
                   int depthLimit,
                   int maxLenConseqs,
                   int maxNumConseqs,
                   long timeLimit,
                   long elapsedTime,
                   long maxNumInfs)
Constructs a search parameter.

Parameters:
strategy - the type of search strategy to use.
lengthening - the type of consequence iterative lengthening search strategy to use.
maxLenConseqs - the maximum length of consequences.
maxNumConseqs - the maximum number of consequences.
timeLimit - the time limit in milliseconds.
elapsedTime - the elapsed time in milliseconds.
maxNumInfs - the maximum number of inferences.
